components.description:
An adult with no gender specified. This emoji may be used to talk about adults in a gender-inclusive way.

Variants include üë© Woman and üë® Man.
components.title: Person

components.description:
Zero Width Joiner (ZWJ) is a Unicode character that joins two or more other characters together in sequence to create a new emoji.

Zero Width Joiner, pronounced "zwidge", is not an emoji and has no appearance by itself. This is an invisible character when used alone.

View Emoji ZWJ Sequences that use this character.
components.title: Zero Width Joiner

components.description: An emoji component displaying a person’s red hair. Intended for use within emoji sequences.
components.title: Emoji Component Red Hair

description:
A person with red hair. This emoji maintains red hair no matter which skin tone is chosen. This emoji may be used to talk about redheads in a gender-inclusive way.

Variants include üë©‍ü¶∞ Woman with Red Hair and üë®‍ü¶∞ Man with Red Hair.
title: Person: Red Hair
apple_vendor_description: The person with red hair emoji on Apple devices is a vibrant and distinctive character, featuring a flowing mane of rich, fiery red hair with realistic highlights and subtle gradients. Apple's design language brings a soft, three-dimensional quality to the figure, with smooth rounded edges that give it a friendly and approachable feel. This emoji can represent individuals with red hair, add a touch of individuality and flair to a message, or symbolize passion, creativity, and boldness, all rendered with Apple's signature polished aesthetic.
